tool.name: ls
tool.description:
List directory contents as a tree structure.
Features: - Displays files and directories in a visual tree format - Automatically ignores common directories (node_modules, .git, __pycache__, etc.) - Supports custom ignore patterns - Limited to 100 files maximum
Use this to explore project structure and understand the codebase layout.

parameters.parameter: The absolute path to the directory to list. Defaults to project root.
Additional glob patterns to ignore. Each pattern is a directory or file name. Example: ["dist", "coverage", "*.log"]

returns.field: The listed directory relative to root
